Rulings.Tengu: ●This effect targets. If “Divine Grace – Northwemko” and one of the cards targeted by its effect are destroyed at the same time, “Divine Grace – Northwemko” will not be destroyed. If there are fewer other face-up cards on the field than monsters Tributed for the Ritual Summon of this card, all other face-up cards are targeted. Tokens used for the Ritual Summon of this card count towards its effect. “Divine Grace – Northwemko” continuously targets the selected cards.

Rulings.Base:
1. This effect targets.
2. If "Divine Grace - Northwemko" and one of the cards targeted by its effect are destroyed at the same time, "Divine Grace - Northwemko" will not be destroyed.
3. If there are fewer other face-up cards on the field than monsters Tributed for the Ritual Summon of this card, all other face-up cards are targeted.
4. Tokens used for the Ritual Summon of this card count towards its effect.
5. "Divine Grace - Northwemko" continuously targets the selected cards.
